#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Search for Your Inherent Qualities
#Text=Everyone is naturally inclined toward having different qualities — some people are even-tempered , some are inherently kind , and others prefer solitude to socialization .
#Text=However , a number of outside influences act on everyone , shaping their behavior or personality in a way that , deep down , feels just wrong .
#Text=If you feel this way , this article will show you how to get to the root of who you are .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Determining Your Qualities
#Text=Consider what qualities you have .
#Text=These could be anything from leadership and a strong intellect to being a great communicator or a healer .
#Text=Most people have a range of qualities , so be sure to list everything that you consider to be a quality .
#Text=Find some forms of qualities listed here ( a very incomplete list ) :
#Text=Generosity , kindness , openness
#Text=Joyful and happy nature
#Text=Truthful , trustworthy , sincere
#Text=Leader , manager , organizer , communicator
#Text=Ethical , patient , tolerant , considerate
#Text=Brave , courageous , fierce , assertive
#Text=Wise , intelligent
#Text=Lonesome , silent
#Text=Strict , unforgiving
#Text=Considerate , well-mannered
#Text=Risk taker , opportunist , entrepreneurial , inspiring
#Text=Idealist , creative , artistic , observer .
#Text=Match your qualities to the things you want to do in life .
#Text=A good match means that you will find the work , hobby , study , vocation , etc. , that will be more enjoyable and successful for you .
#Text=Think back to what you wanted to do when you grew up .
#Text=Often that gives you an idea of what you are best at and are likely to love , based on your inherent qualities .
#Text=Give wings to your imagination .
#Text=Sketch the person you admire and want to be like .

#Text=For instance , if you want to be a fashion designer , think which shoes will you use , what shapes impress you , what cuts appeal to you , what fabrics would you use , which colour combination looks vivacious in a nutshell almost everything .
#Text=You will definitely be able to bring out the best in you and even beyond .
#Text=Dealing with Character Dents
#Text=Listen to other people 's criticisms or feedback about you .
#Text=If someone says you are rude or shy or not studious enough , do n't reply back instantly ; that 's your defensive self in action .
#Text=Instead , decide what about their criticism might have elements of truth in it .
#Text=Then , if you realize critics have a point , work hard on improving that aspect of yourself .
#Text=It may require working on your communication skills , cutting down on sarcastic remarks , working harder , focusing more , saying kinder things , etc.
#Text=Do n't put yourself down or quite because of what others say .
#Text=Learn from their opinions of you , but be a cherry picker – – honestly ascertain what is right , and discard what is just mean or unhelpful .
#Text=Learn to communicate with greater ease .
#Text=Find ways to get your own opinions , thoughts and ideas across to others in ways that provide interest and do not cause others to feel intimidated or preached at .
#Text=It is also important to learn to stand up for yourself , so that your qualities are recognized and not ignored .
#Text=Take challenges thrown to you seriously .
#Text=When someone says you can never do something , aim to be fired up to achieve it at any cost .
#Text=Use those words as a motivation to prove others wrong .
#Text=Acting that way will automatically reveal some personal qualities you have , but you 've never known before .
#Text=Tips
#Text=That day will also come , the day when you will be able to show your inherent qualities to the world .
#Text=Always think positive and in your mind , live life as if you are actually living the life of the kind of person you want to be .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Remember that life is not fair and sometimes merciless , so keep your cool .
